data.content:
noun
[singular] :a gesture in which you hold your hand out with your thumb pointed down in order to say no, to show disapproval, etc.
When I asked him if they won, he just shook his head and gave me a/the thumbs-down. - often used figuratively
Our proposal got a/the thumbs-down. [=our proposal was rejected]
The show got a big thumbs-down from critics. [=critics did not like the show]
